name: Rock Rammer
description:
This is a game where you ram a rock at a building to make it collapse! There are a total of 3 levels only because I ran out of time. :(

Objective: make it collapse before the timer runs out

Controls: WSAD/arrow keys/space

Note: This is my first game jam and also my third proper game, so sorry if its bad. Also sorry if there isn't much detail in the description here, I'm writing this right before the deadline.

Made for Brackeys Game Jam 2021.1!
